defaultBenefits.name: Hotel Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Get up to $300 back in statement credits semi-annually for up to a total of $600 per year on prepaid Fine Hotels + Resorts® or The Hotel Collection bookings through American Express Travel. Bookings with Fine Hotels + Resorts® and The Hotel Collection each come with complimentary benefits, such as a room upgrade at check-in (when available), and a complimentary credit valued at $100 to use towards eligible charges, such as food and beverage, spa, or other on-property charges (which varies by property). Plus, get guaranteed 4 PM checkout, complimentary breakfast on Fine Hotels + Resorts bookings through Amex Travel. Note: The Hotel Collection requires a minimum two-night stay. Certain room categories are not eligible for upgrade.

reminder.message: Use your $300 Hotel Credit for this half of the year on Fine Hotels + Resorts or The Hotel Collection bookings through Amex Travel before it expires!

defaultBenefits.name: Uber Cash
defaultBenefits.description: Add your Platinum Card® to your Uber account to start receiving $15 in Uber Cash each month, plus a bonus $20 in December, to use on rides and orders in the U.S. when you select an Amex Card for your transaction.

reminder.message: Use your $15 Uber Cash credit this month before it expires! ($20 in December)

defaultBenefits.name: Uber One Credit
defaultBenefits.description: As a Platinum Card® Member, you can get up to $120 in statement credits each calendar year after you purchase an auto-renewing Uber One membership with your Card. Terms apply.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $120 Uber One credit before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

defaultBenefits.name: Airline Fee Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Select one qualifying airline and then receive up to $200 in statement credits per calendar year when incidental fees, such as checked bags, in-flight refreshments, flight-change fees, overweight / oversize baggage fees, airport lounge day-passes, pet-kennel fees, and phone reservation fees, are charged by the airline to your Platinum Card® account. Note: American Express relies on airlines to submit the correct information on airline transactions to identify incidental fee purchases. If you do not see a credit for a qualifying incidental purchase on your eligible Card after 8 weeks, simply call the number on the back of your Card. Qualifying airlines are subject to change. See terms & conditions for more details.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $200 Airline Fee Credit before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

defaultBenefits.name: CLEAR Plus Credit
defaultBenefits.description: You can receive up to $209 in statement credits per calendar year after you sign up and pay for a CLEAR Plus Membership (subject to auto-renewal) with your eligible American Express Card.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $209 CLEAR Plus Credit before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

defaultBenefits.name: Resy Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Get up to $100 in statement credits each quarter when you use the Platinum Card® to make eligible purchases with Resy, including dining purchases at over 10,000 U.S. Resy restaurants. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Use your $100 Resy credit this quarter before it expires at the end of the quarter!

defaultBenefits.name: Digital Entertainment Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Treat yourself and discover new shows, news and recipes with Disney+, a Disney+ bundle, ESPN+, Hulu, The New York Times, Paramount+, Peacock, The Wall Street Journal, YouTube Premium, and YouTube TV. Get up to $25 in statement credits each month when you make eligible purchases directly from one or more of our participating partners with your Platinum Card®. Plus, Platinum Card Members will get exclusive access to special perks from time to time. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Use your $25 Digital Entertainment credit this month on Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+, NYT, Paramount+, Peacock, WSJ, YouTube Premium, or YouTube TV before it expires!

defaultBenefits.name: lululemon Credit
defaultBenefits.description: You can receive up to $75 in statement credits each quarter when you use the Card for eligible purchases at U.S. lululemon retail stores (excluding outlets) and lululemon.com. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Use your $75 lululemon credit this quarter at U.S. lululemon retail stores or lululemon.com before it expires!

defaultBenefits.name: Walmart+ Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Get up to a $12.95 statement credit back each month after you pay for a monthly Walmart+ membership (subject to auto-renewal) with your Platinum Card®. Up to $12.95 plus applicable taxes on one membership fee.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $155 Walmart+ Credit before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

defaultBenefits.name: Saks Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Get up to $100 in statement credits annually for purchases at Saks Fifth Avenue or saks.com on your Platinum Card®. That's up to $50 in statement credits from January through June and up to $50 in statement credits from July through December. No minimum purchase required. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Use your $50 Saks credit for this half of the year at Saks Fifth Avenue or saks.com before it expires!

defaultBenefits.name: Oura Ring Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Oura Ring can help you meet your health goals. You can receive up to $200 in statements credits when you use the Platinum Card® to purchase an Oura Ring at Ouraring.com each calendar year. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $200 Oura Ring credit at Ouraring.com before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

defaultBenefits.name: Equinox Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Get up to $300 in statement credits each year at Equinox. Simply use your Platinum Card® to pay for an Equinox+ digital subscription, or an Equinox club membership subject to auto-renewal. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $300 Equinox credit for an Equinox+ digital subscription or club membership before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

defaultBenefits.name: Dunkin Credit
defaultBenefits.description: With the $84 Dunkin' Credit, you can earn up to $7 in monthly statement credits after you enroll and pay with the American Express® Gold Card at U.S. Dunkin' locations.

reminder.message: Use your $7 Dunkin credit this month before it expires at month's end!

defaultBenefits.name: Resy Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Get up to $100 in statement credits each calendar year after you pay with the American Express® Gold Card to dine at U.S. Resy restaurants or make other eligible Resy purchases. That's up to $50 in statement credits from January through June and up to $50 in statement credits from July through December. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Use your $50 Resy credit for this half of the year before it expires at the end of the period!

defaultBenefits.name: Dining Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Earn up to a total of $10 in statement credits monthly when you pay with the Gold Card at Grubhub, The Cheesecake Factory, Goldbelly, Wine.com, and Five Guys. This can be an annual savings of up to $120. Enrollment required.

reminder.message: Use your $10 dining credit this month at Grubhub, The Cheesecake Factory, Goldbelly, Wine.com, or Five Guys before it expires!

defaultBenefits.name: Uber Cash
defaultBenefits.description: Get $10 in Uber Cash each month when you add your Gold Card to your Uber account. You can use your Uber Cash on orders from your favorite restaurants and rides with Uber in the U.S. when you select an Amex Card for your transaction.

reminder.message: Use your $10 Uber Cash credit this month before it expires!

predefinedCards.name: Delta SkyMiles Gold American Express Card

defaultBenefits.name: Delta Stays Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Elevate your travel experience with an annual statement credit of up to $100 after using your Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card to book prepaid hotels or vacation rentals through Delta Stays on delta.com. Enrollment required. Resets each calendar year (January 1 through December 31).

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $100 Delta Stays credit before it expires at the end of the calendar year (December 31)!

predefinedCards.name: Bank of America Customized Cash Rewards
